title: Science Education Content Design Through Genre Analysis of Online Video Tutorials

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational calculus concepts and experience in digital learning environments
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers in leadership roles to enhance science education content creation capabilities. Conducted through a blended approach combining digital devices and offline workshops

learning_goals: Distinguish and explain seven expression formats of online video tutorials
Analyze interactions between multimodal elements (text, audio, visual components) and propose content effectiveness evaluation criteria
Complete a science education content design project based on calculus problem-solving tutorial cases

resources: Calculus (Differentiation/Integration) Topic-Specific Online Tutorial Samples (5 Types)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
